statements: UPDATE threat_actor_profiles SET actor_description = 'Updated description' WHERE actor_id = 1;

UPDATE threat_actors SET threat_level = 5 WHERE threat_actor_id = 1;
UPDATE ttps SET description = 'New tactic deployed', type = 'Phishing' WHERE ttp_id = 3;
UPDATE threat_actors SET name='Anonymous', country='Global' WHERE organization='Anonymous Hackers' AND threat_level=5;
UPDATE ttps SET description='Advanced Persistent Threat', type='APT' WHERE ttp_id=2;

UPDATE actor_ttps SET threat_actor_id = 2 WHERE ttp_id = 3;
